entry.title: WASP Community Building Summer School welcomes new PhD students to WASP

link.title: WASP Community Building Summer School welcomes new PhD students to WASP

entry.summary: The annual Community Building Summer School is the perfect opportunity for PhD students to learn more about WASP, receive information about all the great opportunities they are offered during their PhD journey and to meet the WASP community. This year’s Community Building Summer School took place 26-30 of August in Norrköping, whereof one day in […]

entry.title: Thematic Summer School on Embodied AI – an opportunity to meet experts and discuss the future of embodied AI

link.title: Thematic Summer School on Embodied AI – an opportunity to meet experts and discuss the future of embodied AI

entry.summary: The Thematic Summer School on Embodied AI was arranged 24-27th June 2024 at Örebro University. During these days the students got to explore the intersection of artificial intelligence, robotics, neuroscience, and cognitive science. As we witness rapid advancements in technology, it is crucial to understand how AI systems can interact with and learn from their […]

entry.title: Submissions open to the Nordic Conference on Law and Information Technology

link.title: Submissions open to the Nordic Conference on Law and Information Technology

entry.summary: The Swedish Law and Informatics Research Institute organises this year’s edition of the Nordic Conference on Law and Information Technology. The conference will take place on the 4th-6th November 2024 in Stockholm. During the conference, there’s a panel for doctoral students where they can present their research, get comments from senior researchers, and discuss it with the […]

entry.title: Matteo Iovino new project manager for WARA Robotics

link.title: Matteo Iovino new project manager for WARA Robotics

entry.summary: Matteo Iovino took over as project manager for WARA Robotics in April. His ambition is to grow in the number of students actively using the network and he has already initiated activities to achieve that, such as a Mobile Manipulation Challenge ongoing with AstraZeneca – but more is to come! Although this role is new […]

entry.title: WASP and California Institute of Technology strengthen their collaboration within AI

link.title: WASP and California Institute of Technology strengthen their collaboration within AI

entry.summary: The Wallenberg AI, Autonomous Systems and Software Program (WASP) and the California Institute of Technology (Caltech) have signed a Memorandum of Understanding to increase collaboration within research and programs related to AI, autonomous systems and software. This will further strengthen the research within this field. “A key instrument for excellence in research is close collaborations […]

entry.title: Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation extends WASP Research Program with a new initiative: AI for Science

link.title: Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation extends WASP Research Program with a new initiative: AI for Science

entry.summary: Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation grants SEK 70 million to the Wallenberg AI, Autonomous Systems and Software Program (WASP), for a new initiative that promotes the uptake of AI based methodologies in academic research in Sweden. With the new initiative, WASP takes on the mission to coordinate AI for science efforts in Sweden. “This initiative […]

entry.title: Over 30 delegates attended the first WARA Ops workshop

link.title: Over 30 delegates attended the first WARA Ops workshop

entry.summary: The WASP Research Arena for Operational Data (WARA Ops) hosted its very first workshop at Ericsson Lund on May 17, 2024. Visitors from industry and academia enjoyed interesting talks, a panel session on academic use of operational datasets from industry, and guided tours of the Ericsson data centre and Ericsson garage. – Our first workshop attracted […]

link.title: Invitation to Testa Challenge 2024: Accelerate Your Bioprocess Innovation!

entry.summary: This information is a tip from Testa Center in Uppsala: The application period for this year’s Testa Challenge is now open! Are you seeking a platform to verify your technical or digital innovations in a real bioprocessing environment? Then you are welcome to apply for a spot at the Testa Challenge 2024! entry.title: WARA Robotics Mobile Manipulation Challenge
entry.summary: The WARA Robotics Mobile Manipulation Challenge is now open to the WASP Community. Take the chance to challenge yourself and your team in the complexities associated with mobile manipulation, delve deeper into lab automation and get access to the ABB Mobile YuMi research platform. The best team will be awarded with a prize. About the […]

entry.title: WARA PS Events 2024
entry.summary: WARA PS is planning for a new year filled with opportunities to grow closer as a community and integrate new researchers and partners. Like previous years, we have a Data Collection Week in Gränsö, Västervik, in week 22, where we will host hackatons, workshops and sessions to record new data. This is a great opportunity […]
